question: What can you help me with?
answer: When it comes to machine learning, model development, feature development, monitoring, and deployment across all three major cloud providers.

list.title: Analyzing and documenting customer business processes, target potential customers, create product roadmaps, work on product features.
Suggesting similar solutions already active on the market to benchmark against.

In terms of solutions development, provide an A to Z approach to clients, a holistic understanding of the data lifecycle and experience working on each portion of it; data acquisition, data engineering, data intelligence and analytics, data presentation (frontend, backend, graphics, and UI/UX design), and technical support skills.

question: How can I become a Datwit partner?
answer: We are exited to know you want to join us! We would really like to get to know your business and discuss the possibilities of our future collaboration. Please, go ahead and contact us through any of the following ways: by our online form, e-mail [contact@datwit.com], or by reaching out to our partner line [call: 1-800-WIT+]. We will be happy to meet and discuss what we can do together. Just be sure to bring a detailed plan for your idea(s) to showcase how it will improve our customer success.

question: What do I need to know before contacting you?
answer: Having a clear picture of where can you provide the most help to our customers. For example, you might have more experience in data engineering or perhaps in ML modeling and monitoring. You might also be able to provide general development services but it will take time away from things you really shine at doing. Each of your solid base skills will drive the path of our future relationship. Always remember, our customers are the reason we exist. Guaranteen our customers success is creating our own. As a Datwit partner, you are an extension of that goal, and we want to make sure you have the tools and resources to experience the same success. We will be happy to help you get started, building projects from scratch is nothing new for us. For more details, please check out our partnership strategy

question: How much time will it take for you to make my app?
answer: Project timing is not an exact science. To give you a reasonable answer we must prepare a project scope, create deadlines, and a budget. We will tell you how much of that scope will need to be completed within the budget and time constraints. We'll be able to estimate how long will it take after at least a month of work.

question: How do you guarantee product quality?
answer: We evaluate the result after every two weeks, we test our work (we conduct both development and acceptance tests), we present it to you, we apply your feedback so you know you get what you are paying for.

question: How can I be sure you work at my project as much as you declare?
answer: We thoroughly monitor our developers and control how much time they spend on each task down to the exact minute. We use... to track time spent on your project.

question: What happens after you finish my app?
answer: Hopefully the app is exactly what you dreamed of :) But apart from delivering a finished product, we are happy to provide you with technical support and app maintenance should you need it. After all, we know our work inside out. Of course if you want to maintain the app by yourself the source code and all technical data is at your disposal, but even in that case, feel free to contact us if you need any help.

question: Will development include the creation of prototypes and demo versions that I can try out?
answer: Agile Methodolgy compels us to create operating software as soon as possible and later just add next features along the process. Therefore, you'll be able to examine and test your software very early.

question: What is your experience?
answer: We are professionals with more than 10 years of experience. We are experienced in creating web applications of all kind using modern techniques and including machine learning algorithms

question: What technology do you use? Are there any reasons why you chose those particular technologies?
answer: For back-end we use Python which gives the developers a lot of possibilities when it comes to prototyping, allows them to take advantage of ready-to-use components, and speeds up the development process. Indeed - the first results are visible almost immediately. Python is also an amazing language to use when it comes  to machine learnign For front-end we use React.js. We use React because it is perfect for a wide range of projects, fast iterations, implementations, prototyping and creating a proof of concept. Itâ€™s simple and scalable. A library very loved and widelly adopted all over the development world.
